title: PICC Result and other news
text: After some last minute fixes we managed to compete at the conference in Florence and ended up winning first place! The AP-S URSI 2024 conference was amazing and we had a blast. I will now, once my time in both PICC and LFS is over, look for new adventures!

title: Artificial Neural Networks trained by a Genetic Algorithm to play... Pong?!
text: Last night, I sat up working on my final project for a computational biology course. The project is an attempt to train artificial neural networks to play pong, by letting them compete with each other in a genetic algorithm. The results were suprisingly good, and the project is on github for anyone interested. https://github.com/tbergkvist/ANN-GA-pong

title: PICC progress
text: We have started working with the hardware of the PICC setup now. Yesterday we also sent out requests for sponsorships and grants to a number of companies and foundations. Let's hope we can raise enough to go to Florence!

title: The PICC Group
text: I am happy to announce that I will, along with 3 fellow students, participate as a finalist in the IEEE AP-S Student Design Contest. We call ourself the PICC group (Polarization and Impedance Controlled Car) and we will present an educational and fancy way to control a RC car with on-body antennas. We will compete against 5 other universities in Florence, Italy in July. https://2024.apsursi.org/sdc.php

title: First blog post
text:
I have just finished setting up this portfolio page!
Maybe someone will read it in the future!
